title: Ticket #1011: Condor 7.4.0 on Debian stable - startd dies with "segmentation fault"
description: See condor-users thread with the same subject
remarks:
2009-Dec-02 08:31:29 by nleroy:
Andreas Hirczy <ahi@itp.tugraz.at> tested the patch, and verified that it solves this problem. Snippet from the email:

Thanks! Patch applied yesterday and ran over night - seems to work. Binaries are in <http://itp.tugraz.at/Comp/debian/dists/lenny/test/binary-i386/condor_7.4.0-2_i386.deb>; source in <http://itp.tugraz.at/Comp/debian/dists/lenny/test/source/>. I will try to build another Version for X86_64.
check_ins: 2009-Nov-30 14:56   Check-in [16462]: Fixed initialization bug in network adapter initialization that was causing a seg fault with gcc 4.3.2 (#1011) (By Nick LeRoy )
creator: nleroy
